history.proof: intros R tr1 tr2 H. unfold sound_trace in *. intros k s ms Htr1. specialize (H k s ms). apply H. srun best use: @stream_app_spec1' unfold: trace.

original: intros R tr1 tr2 H. unfold sound_trace in *. intros k s ms Htr1. specialize (H k s ms). apply H. specialize (Htr1). destruct Htr1 as [k' [s' [ms' Htr1]]]. exists k'. exists s'. exists ms'. auto.
